posts.post_content:
EDIT-6/12/2020

I'm just getting started with building my own personal collection of T206 cards, so I'm new to the site.  I'm on a limited budget, so I'm really only looking for low grade cards with decent eye appeal (ideally PSA graded, because I'm working on a display).

Here is the list I'm working with:

Ty Cobb (Red or Green Portrait)
Christy Mathewson (Dark Cap)
Eddie Collins
Tris Speaker

[Strike]Cy Young (Portrait) - PURCHASED
[STRIKE]Nap Lajoie (w/Bat) - PURCHASED
[STRIKE]Home Run Baker - PURCHASED
[STRIKE]Wajo (Portrait) - PURCHASED
[STRIKE]John McGraw (Glove at Hip) - PURCHASED

Please PM me, or email me at [url]williammkoehler@gmail.com[/url].  I'm happy to do FF or standard Paypal with 3%.

Thanks for your consideration!
BK
in the spirit of bumping... bump.
Random question, but what does FF stand for? I see it referenced a lot but not sure what it means.

[quote name="jbro" post=1989552]Random question, but what does FF stand for? I see it referenced a lot but not sure what it means.[/QUOTE]PPFF is paypal friends and family. Some people just shorten it to FF. It is paypal without fees, but also without protections. 

Sent from my SAMSUNG-SM-G930A using Tapatalk
